title: Working
body:
Look at this scar. 
This is proof that I was once a mother. 
I gave up my body and my child for my country. 
There is nothing left inside me now. 
Nothing at all. No hatred, not even regret. 
And yet sometimes at night I can still feel the pain creeping up inside me. 
Slithering through my body, like a snake.
Keep up the good work!

title: Slacking
body:
I raised you, and loved you, I've given you a space to thrive, 
taught you techniques, endowed you with knowledge. 
There's nothing more for me to give you. 
All that's left for you to take is my patience.
